name: dias-sin-accidentes
description: Node.js application to track days without incidents - Docker ready for port 443 deployment

scripts.docker:update: npm run docker:stop && docker rm dias-counter && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:dev:up: docker run -d --name dias-dev-counter -p 3001:4443 -e ADMIN_PASSWORD=dev -e DATA_FILE_PATH=/data/data.test.json -e PORT=4443 -v $(pwd)/data:/data:rw --restart unless-stopped ensayo-dias-sin-accidentes
scripts.docker:prod:up: docker run -d --name dias-prod-counter -p 3002:4443 -e ADMIN_PASSWORD=prod -e DATA_FILE_PATH=/data/data.prod.json -e PORT=4443 -v $(pwd)/data:/data:rw --restart unless-stopped ensayo-dias-sin-accidentes
